title: New AP Items Rework

embed.description: New/Reworked AP items in League of Legends →Subscribe Here: http://full.sc/1gukNqq →Alphadraft, win prizes by drafting an LCS team: http://alphadraft.com/?redmercy →Top 5 Assassins Updated: http://bit.ly/1Ll2FO1 Follow me here! →My Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/RedmercyLoL →Twitter: http://twitter.com/RedmercyLoL →Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedmercyLoL →My Instagram: http://instagram.com/redmercylol →Second Channel: https://www.youtube.com/redmercygaming Redmercy Merchandising Now Available!

body: I found this video on youtube. It lists several possible changes to many AP items including the big ones like{{item:3089}} and {{item:1058}} as well as {{item:3157}} and {{item:3285}}. There a many more in the clip. For more details see the link. Please share your thoughts on this. It will be coming our way soon. The changes are on PBE. I saw one of the changes when they showcased the new map.

replies.body:
Honestly i love the changes, for the one simple fact.

It will actually diversify the items mid laners buy.

That and a decent chunk of my mid laners love a tear/RoA.
